mainText:
Promo: "Join Bank of Entitlement today and watch your dreams come true with our exclusive VIP services!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I stroll into Bank of Entitlement, expecting the red carpet treatment as always. But this time, the teller dares to ask me for my ID! My jaw practically hits the marble floor. I mean, how dare they question my identity, right? So, I whip out my phone and call my lawyer, demanding immediate compensation for the emotional distress caused by this blatant disregard for my VIP status. Let's just say, the teller won't be making that mistake again. Isn't it glorious when the universe realigns to acknowledge your superior existence? Ah, the perks of being me.
